Description:
Detects usage of Metasploit SMB PsExec (exploit/windows/smb/psexec) and Impacket psexec.py by triggering on specific service installation

Author: Bartlomiej Czyz, Relativity
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Metasploit Or Impacket Service Installation Via SMB PsExec
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where ((eventid = '4697' and servicefilename re '^%systemroot%\\[a-zA-Z]{8}\.exe$' and servicename re '(^[a-zA-Z]{4}$)|(^[a-zA-Z]{8}$)|(^[a-zA-Z]{16}$)' and servicestarttype = '3' and servicetype = '0x10') and  not servicename = 'psexesvc')
